department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Acquisition of translation services for the Translation Bureau.
description: This bid solicitation is for the acquisition of translation services for the Translation Bureau, from English to French in the field of  Government contracts and procurement, with a volume of up to 1,000,000 words distributed as follows: 6,000,000 words for the initial period of three (3) years and up to 2,000,000 words over each of the two (2) one-year irrevocable option to extend the contract. One contract will be awarded as a result of this bid solicitation.
full_summary:
**Translation Services Tender Announcement**
=========================================

### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

**Reference Number:** PW-__ZF-524-41296

**Solicitation Number:** EP745-231679/A

**Publication Date:** January 11, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** January 20, 2023 (14:00:00)

### Overview

Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Tendering Procedures: Competitive Procurement Strategy based on the Best Overall Proposal

The Translation Bureau is seeking proposals from eligible suppliers to provide English to French translation services for government contracts and procurement. The requirement involves a volume of up to 10,000,000 words distributed over three years, with the possibility of two one-year options to extend.

### Eligibility

Invitations to bid are limited to suppliers who are pre-qualified under the Translation Bureau's directory of suppliers for translation services, specifically in the Tier 3 - field of Government contracts and procurement, from English to French. The following suppliers have been invited to submit a bid:

*   LionBridge Ltd
*   Sym Communications Inc
*   R&R International Translation
*   Nations Translation Group LP

### Tender Process

To obtain the solicitation documents, eligible suppliers should contact the Contracting Authority at TPSGC.PADDSBT-APRFPTB.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Delivery and Language

Delivery date: As indicated above.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French). 

### Contact Information:

Contact Person: Anick Mongeon
Email: anick.mongeon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: (873) 354-4883
Address: Les Terrasses de la Chaudière, 10, rue Wellington, 5e étage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5

### Contracting Entity

Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5
